item.content:encoded:
After 2 parties of any kind the same day, all the prices double; after 4 parties, the price triples, and so on.

Just a reminder that this should factor in to how you look at the costs.

4 Karaokes cost 800+800+1600+1600 = 4800 ryo for 10k-20k daily exp, or 1 Research Expedition.
8 Karaokes cost 800+800+1600+1600+2400+2400+3200+3200 = 4800+4800+6400 = 16000 ryo for 20k-40k daily exp, or 2 Research Expeditions.

20000 ryo could pay for 1 All-Out Bash, or 3 Research Expeditions, or 9 Karaokes, presuming you threw no parties beforehand.
40000 ryo could pay for 2 All-Out Bashes, or 4.66 Research Expeditions, or just over 13 Karaokes, again assuming no parties were done prior.

If you're going to use the Party Room, the All-Out Bash obviously gives you the most gain for how much you spend, hands down. However, the smaller parties may have some advantages when at a lower rank in S1, or when you need a small FP boost for cheap.
